FuncDef: The uninstall feature-software command uninstalls a feature package. The uninstall feature-software command uninstalls a feature package.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a feature package.
The value is a string of 1 to 127 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Examples: Warning: This will uninstall the package IGPV100R001C10.ccx, Continue? [Y/N]:y
Warning: This will uninstall the package V100R001C00B001-PNF_Feature2.ccx,V100R001C00B001-PNF_Feature1.ccx, Continue? [Y/N]:y
ExtraInfo: If the installed feature package is not required, you can run this command to uninstall it to save system resources.
